name: Maude

topics.response_text: {Player in combat}Oh my! Keep me out of this!

topics.topic_text: Aren't you kind of old to be doing this?
topics.response_text: Old but spry, honey. So long as my back don't give out, I can make a living lying on it.
That's right. Strange at first, having a woman for a pimp, but she's tough enough to handle any trouble so far.
She's a good earner.{sour grapes}Of course, she don't care who she sleeps with or what they do to her.
{Male PC}Best prices around so long as{alluding to anal sex}you don't try putting anything someplace it was never intended. How's that sound?
{Male PC}You know where to find me, honey.

topics.topic_text: <75 caps> What the hell. Let's do it.
topics.response_text: You won't notice anything once the lights are out, hon. The places that count are still firm enough...

topics.topic_text: <75 caps needed> I don't have enough caps on me.
topics.response_text: Well, I'm not a goddamn charity, so come back when you do.
I'll be right here if you change your mind, honey. Just let me know.

topics.topic_text: What do you know about Jimmy?
topics.response_text: I suppose he's okay, for one of{disapproving of his homosexuality}those. I suppose Pretty Sarah's got to cover every sort of customer.

topics.topic_text: What do you know about Dermot and Saint James?
topics.response_text: Those boys been living here a while now. They sell salvage and do all right. I never been with either of them.

conversation.response_text: {Male PC}You know where to find me, honey.

description:
Maude is a 72 year-old Caucasian human Female.

The oldest prostitute at the Casa Madrid Apartments, Maude is a weathered but still functional woman who relies on her years of experience rather than fading looks to attract clients. Despite her age and occasional back pain, she maintains a confident demeanor and takes pride in her work. She's well aware that Pretty Sarah considers her the 'discount' option, charging only 75 caps compared to Sweetie's higher rates, but doesn't let it bother her.

Maude's Personality: Confident and pragmatic about her profession, Maude is straightforward in her interactions. She harbors homophobic views, openly disapproving of Jimmy and considering Sweetie perverted for having female clients. Despite her age, she's resilient and has adapted to the harsh realities of life in the Mojave Wasteland.

Maude's Backstory: Born before the Great War, Maude spent her early life in relative comfort on the West Coast. After the bombs fell in 2077, she struggled to survive in the harsh wasteland, eventually making her way to the Mojave. Over the decades, she developed practical skills to endure and even thrive in this new world. By her 40s, she had settled in Westside and began working at the Casa Madrid Apartments, where she's remained for the past three decades. While she's considered the 'old timer' of the establishment, her experience has made her a respected figure among both the staff and regular clients.
